thread.section_title: PlushBeds.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PlushBeds.com | plushbeds.com
thread.title: MikeD

author: MikeD
title: MikeD
text: We just received our 10" king size custom Natural Bliss latex mattress this week. My side is medium-firm and my wife has medium so we both get just what we need for our comfort. We have had memory foam mattresses for several years and this sleeps a little differently. It's a little more bouncy, you definitely won't feel like you are stuck in the mattress. I wasn't so sure about it for only about 5 minutes, then I found that I really liked the difference. I also want to praise customer support. We had a couple of questions about getting a local setup company and linking to the shipping company for tracking. We dealt with Jolene Swisher who is the best customer service rep I have ever had the pleasure to work with. She helped walk me through any necessary steps to get the needed info and responded to emails quickly. She is one reason that I will recommend your company without reservation.
